app_descript:
Depression Test

Brief

Depression Test is a self-assessment app designed to help users monitor their mental state and identify potential symptoms of depression. Based on the scientifically validated DASS test, it provides a quick and effective way for individuals to gain insights into their emotional health. However, it emphasizes the importance of professional medical advice alongside its usage.

Core Features

  • Scientific Self-Diagnosis: Utilizes the DASS methodology to offer an effective self-assessment of depression levels. ğŸ“Š
  • Rapid Testing: Allows users to quickly evaluate their mental state with a user-friendly interface. â±ï¸
  • Symptom Awareness: Educates users on common signs of depression, such as discouragement and lack of initiative. ğŸ“š
  • Professional Guidance Reminder: Encourages users to seek professional help for a comprehensive understanding of their mental health. âš•ï¸
  • Additional Resources: Offers enrollment in the Stop Anxiety program for further support against stress and anxiety. ğŸŒ±
